title: Fighting bad information
thankYouMessage: Thank you for your support. We're hugely grateful for your donation. It will help Full Fact check more claims, push for corrections, and bring a higher standard of honesty to public debate ahead of next year's general election.
summary: Bad information ruins lives. It promotes hate, damages people’s health, and hurts democracy. With the next general election likely next year, our team of independent fact checkers continue to fight the causes and consequences of bad information. Your donation will support this vital work.
solution:
We fact check claims made by politicians, public institutions and journalists, as well as viral content online. We then follow up on our fact checks. By asking people to correct the record when they get things wrong, we can reduce the spread of bad information. 

We’re developing world-leading technology and new research to spot repeated false claims and investigate tackling misinformation on a global scale. And we campaign for the changes that will make bad information rarer and less harmful.
problem:
The impact of misinformation is felt by everyone. Disinformation is used to spread hate and deepen divisions. Of the 42 MPs we’ve asked to correct the record this year, only 12 have done so. This isn’t good enough!

In a world with more information than ever before, it’s hard to know what to trust. And trusting the wrong thing can have real-world implications; especially in an election year. 

When our MPs and media make incorrect claims, and when false and misleading information is spread online, we all suffer.

budgetDetails.description: to fact check and help stop the spread of viral claims which are causing harm.
to raise accountability for politicians and internet companies.
to further our campaign for honesty and build a community which stands against bad information.

alternativeFundUse: If the campaign target is not met we will continue to raise funds from other sources. These will be used to further the aims above. We are confident that all funds will be spent to further the aims above, even if specific activities were changed or adapted.
aims: We will continue fact check and correct false claims. Your matched donation will help our team identify inaccurate claims, produce well-evidenced fact checks, and ask for corrections; stopping claims from spreading further.
You will help us call for improvements to how false claims are addressed in public life, and demand transparency from internet platforms on how they’re addressing misinformation on their platforms.

Your support helps grow our reach. The more people who know about Full Fact, the greater our voice, and the more effective our campaigning for greater honesty can be - crucial as we approach another general election.
